posts.post_content:
Offered here is a very nice 1909 Boston Bloomer Girls Postcard . The Postcard is unused and graded an SGC 3. it looks more like excellent to me. The players are in B B Dark uniforms surrounded by period, vintage pennants, bats and balls. On the bottom it says Greetings from The Boston Bloomer Girls. It has excellent clarity , centering and contrast. Some honest light corner wear is all I can see here. Great item.  
234.99 plus 6.00 for actual usps shipping with tracking

interesting postcard. Never seen this 

Need to research the history of it.

Love the history of the game
Bump for price drop on this postcard
Price drop to 234.99. Open to trades for other tobacco era cards too
